title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil, saut√© onion and garlic. Add chicken and brown. Mix curry powder, coconut milk, and salt. Simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil, stir fry vegetables for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and cook 2 more minutes.

title: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry bacon. Beat eggs with cheese, mix with hot pasta and bacon. Add seasoning.

title: Beef Steak
instructions: Season steak. Sear in hot pan with oil and garlic for 3-5 minutes per side depending on doneness.

title: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble eggs in oil. Add rice, peas, and soy sauce. Stir-fry for 5 minutes.

title: Tomato Soup
instructions: Boil tomatoes and blend with onion and garlic. Add broth and season. Simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Grill fish with spices. Assemble in taco shells with lettuce, tomato, and yogurt sauce.

title: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash bananas, mix with all ingredients. Cook on skillet until golden on both sides.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread slices, place cheese in between, and grill on pan until golden and melted.

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop fruits, drizzle with honey and lemon juice. Toss gently and serve chilled.
